game.title: Frost Dragon Hunt
game.description: Your mission is to journey through the icy peaks of the Boneweave mountains, find the Frost Dragon, and slay it. It has been raining terror on the nearby village.

tasks.description: The journey is treacherous but you must climb the Boneweave peaks to find the Frost Dragon's lair.
It is said the lair is filled with blue ice. Search the mountain peaks until you find it.
Once you find the lair, challenge the Frost Dragon to a battle and defeat it.
